results.name: Rectangular array T(n,k) of central polygonal numbers, by antidiagonals.
comment: In the standard notation, the offset is different: the first row are the 2-gonal, the second row the 3-gonal numbers, etc. - R. J. Mathar, Oct 07 2011
link: Clark Kimberling and John E. Brown, Partial Complements and Transposable Dispersions, J. Integer Seqs., Vol. 7 (2004) # 04.1.6
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Jul 14 2003
